summary: Thorin Oakenshield is a character from J.R.R. Tolkien's book "The Hobbit." He's a dwarf and the leader of a group trying to take back a mountain from a dragon. Thorin is known for being proud, greedy, and a bit grumpy, like many dwarves in Norse stories. Despite his flaws, he learns to overcome his greediness before he dies, similar to the character Scrooge in "A Christmas Carol." Thorin appears in movies, an animated version, and a video game based on the book.
title: Thorin Oakenshield
